content: These discussion questions are really helpful! I think they'll definitely help guide the conversation and encourage the members in "Book Lovers Unite" to share their thoughts and opinions. I'm also thinking of asking the members to come prepared with their own questions and insights, so we can have a more dynamic discussion. Do you think it's a good idea to set a specific topic or theme for the discussion, like the portrayal of marriage or the impact of social media, to help focus the conversation?
